bioconda.name: bioconductor-cellnoptr
bioconda.summary: Training of boolean logic models of signalling networks using prior knowledge networks and perturbation data

biotools.summary: This package does optimisation of boolean logic networks of signalling pathways based on a previous knowledge network and a set of data upon perturbation of the nodes in the network.

bioschemas.name: CellNOptR
bioschemas.summary: This package does optimisation of boolean logic networks of signalling pathways based on a previous knowledge network and a set of data upon perturbation of the nodes in the network.
